effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to use this move for 2–5 turns, selected at random. All Pokémon on the field wake up, and none can fall to sleep until the lock-in ends. Pokémon cannot use rest during this effect. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to use this move for 2–5 turns, selected at random. All Pokémon on the field wake up, and none can fall to sleep until the lock-in ends. Pokémon cannot use rest during this effect. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to use this move for 2–5 turns, selected at random. All Pokémon on the field wake up, and none can fall to sleep until the lock-in ends. Pokémon cannot use rest during this effect. This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Forced to use this move for several turns. Pokémon cannot fall asleep in that time.
short_effect.platinum: Forced to use this move for several turns. Pokémon cannot fall asleep in that time.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Forced to use this move for several turns. Pokémon cannot fall asleep in that time.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user attacks in an uproar for two to five turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks in an uproar for two to five turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user attacks in an uproar for two to five turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.
